abstract: Tony Hayward becomes the permanent nonexecutive chairman of Glencore after an interim role in the post. Ivan Glasenberg will continue as chief executive.
snippet: Tony Hayward becomes the permanent nonexecutive chairman of Glencore after an interim role in the post. Ivan Glasenberg will continue as chief executive.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Glencore Xstrata, the big commodities trading and mining company, said on Thursday that it had named Tony Hayward, the former chief executive of BP, to be its permanent chairman. Mr. Hayward has been serving in the role in an interim capacity for the past year.

headline.main: Former BP Chief Is Named Chairman of Glencore Xstrata
